start.speaker: Pixel
start.text: Awesome! A platformer - the classic jump-and-run adventure! Let's build this scene by scene with meaningful choices that shape your game. First, let's define your world's theme!
start.followUp: What kind of world should your platformer take place in? This choice bundles matching backgrounds, platforms, and music!

options.text: A: Forest Adventure - Lush greenery, wooden platforms, nature sounds
B: Desert Challenge - Sandy dunes, stone blocks, mystical ambience

projectSetup.speaker: Pixel
projectSetup.text: Perfect choice! Now let's make this YOUR game. What should we call your platformer adventure?

options.text: A: Let me type my own game name
B: Generate a cool name based on my theme

titlePresentation.speaker: Pixel
titlePresentation.text: How should your title screen present the game name?

options.text: A: Animated Title - Letters bounce in with particle effects
B: Static Title with Effects - Glowing, pulsing logo with lens flares

titleShowcase.speaker: Pixel
titleShowcase.text: What should be the main focus of your title screen?

options.text: A: Hero Showcase - Character bounces and shows abilities
B: World Preview - Scrolling preview of level elements

jumpMechanics.speaker: Pixel
jumpMechanics.text: STAGE 2: Core Mechanics! First - how should jumping feel?

options.text: A: Floaty Jump - Variable height with air control
B: Realistic Jump - Fixed arc with momentum physics

movementSpeed.speaker: Pixel
movementSpeed.text: How fast should your character move?

options.text: A: Speedy Runner - Fast-paced action gameplay
B: Careful Explorer - Precision platforming focus

deathStyle.speaker: Pixel
deathStyle.text: What happens when the player gets hit or falls?

options.text: A: Instant Respawn - Quick fade and back in action
B: Dramatic Death Animation - Full sequence with sound effects

checkpointSystem.speaker: Pixel
checkpointSystem.text: How forgiving should the checkpoint system be?

options.text: A: Generous Checkpoints - Save progress frequently
B: Challenging Sparse - Checkpoints only at major milestones

platformTypes.speaker: Pixel
platformTypes.text: STAGE 3: World Building! What kind of platforms will challenge players?

options.text: A: Moving Platforms - Patrol paths and elevators
B: Static Challenges - Crumbling and bouncy platforms

enemyBehavior.speaker: Pixel
enemyBehavior.text: How should enemies behave when they spot the player?

options.text: A: Patrol Routes - Predictable patterns to learn
B: Chase Mode - Actively hunt the player

powerUpStyle.speaker: Pixel
powerUpStyle.text: What power-up system fits your game best? This includes collectibles too!

options.text: A: Mario Style - Mushrooms for size, flowers for projectiles, coins for lives
B: Sonic Style - Rings for health, shields for protection, speed boosts

bossPattern.speaker: Pixel
bossPattern.text: STAGE 4: Boss Battle! How should the boss AI work?

options.text: A: Predictable Patterns - Learn attack sequences to win
B: Adaptive AI - Boss learns and counters player strategy

arenaDesign.speaker: Pixel
arenaDesign.text: What kind of arena should the boss fight take place in?

options.text: A: Open Arena - Focus on dodging and timing
B: Platform Challenge - Use environment to your advantage

bossDefeat.speaker: Pixel
bossDefeat.text: How should the boss defeat be presented?

options.text: A: Epic Cutscene - Dramatic slow-motion with explosions
B: Quick Celebration - Jump to victory immediately

levelComplete.speaker: Pixel
levelComplete.text: STAGE 5: Transitions & Polish! What happens when a level is completed?

options.text: A: Stats Screen - Show time, score, collectibles found
B: Victory Dance - Character celebrates with animation

gameOver.speaker: Pixel
gameOver.text: What happens when the player runs out of lives?

options.text: A: Retry from Checkpoint - Continue from last checkpoint
B: Restart Level - Begin the entire level again

celebrationEffects.speaker: Pixel
celebrationEffects.text: Finally, what celebration effects for game completion?

options.text: A: Confetti Explosion - Colorful paper celebration
B: Fireworks Display - Sky-filling pyrotechnics
